text: Diabolus in Musica can refer to: ==Music== * the Diabolus in musica, the tritone, a certain musical interval * Diabolus in Musica (ensemble) (1992-present) a French medieval ensemble * Diabulus in Musica, a Spanish symphonic metal band ===Albums=== * Diabolus in Musica, a 1998 album by Slayer * Diabolus in Musica, Accardo interpreta Paganini, an album by Salvatore Accardo ===Songs=== * "Diabulus in musica", a song by Mägo de Oz on their album Gaia II: La Voz Dormida, also released as a single
title: Diabolus in musica
